sectionsRetrieved.content: How do I know if my Tesla battery needs replacement? Tesla batteries are designed to last many years; the vehicle will notify you if maintenance is needed.
What is Tesla's battery warranty? Teslaâ€™s battery warranty typically lasts for 8 years or about 150,000 miles, depending on the model.
